actions: Nourishes the Blood Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Dispels Wind-Dampness, strengthens the sinews and bones and invigorates Blood circulation.
With Yin Yang Huo, Gui Sui Bu and Ji Xue Teng, for bone spurs.
Tonifies Kidney Yang, strengthens the sinews and bones and invigorates the Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
Invigorates and tonifies the Blood, activates the channels and relaxes the sinews.
Dispels Wind-Cold-Dampness, warms and unblocks the flow of Yang Qi and strengthens the sinews and bones.
Reduces Food Stagnation, transforms accumulation, promotes digestion, eliminates distention, descends Qi and reduces Phlegm.

syndromes: Blood and Yang Deficiency with Cold

symptoms: Localized painful swellings without a head that bleed into the surrounding tissues and do not affect the color or texture of the skin
The swellings are not hot to the touch
Wasting of the muscles of the thigh and calf
manifestations.pulse: Thready and forceless or Deep and slow
